snippet: Angela Merkel threw her weight behind efforts by the European Union to forge closer partnerships with Ukraine and five other countries.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel demands that Russia allow its former territories, particularly Ukraine, to exercise the sovereign right to make alliances as they choose, in her first speech to the German Parliament since winning the general election.
lead_paragraph: Angela Merkel threw her weight behind efforts by the European Union to forge closer partnerships with Ukraine and five other countries.

headline.main: German Chancellor Makes Plea for Ukraine
headline.print_headline: German Chancellor Makes Plea for Ukraine
